L'Œuvre de ma vie

short film production

February 2017, independent group project

Short film produced from scratch in 36 hours.

Nicolas Carion, Ka Hei Cheung, Milo Donnelly, Adrien Foutelet, Amélie Josserand, Guilhem Manchon, and Romain Versaevel.

With the support of Champ Libre association and ensmédia.

>
Everything started with Mozart’s Requiem in D minor, K. 626, a song around which our short had to encircle.

In the following 36 hours, we created everything of our short: plot and script, screenplay, casting, acting, shooting, montage, sound and music post-production.

Synopsis

One day, Monsieur receives a medical letter which declares his critical health situation and his imminent death. Disheartened by this news, he laments in tears, until the servants bring him to his bucket list, of which the last item - create his life-time masterpiece - remains unchecked…
